sentence.text: While many downstream effectors of actin cytoskeleton reorganization have been established, the upstream regulators of ATR and the impact of such regulation on liver cancer remain unclear.
Here we demonstrate new functions for regulation of cytokinesis in actin cytoskeleton reorganization activation in vitro and liver tumor suppression in vivo.

The in vivo negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of regulation of cytokinesis loss on liver tumorigenesis was determined using the hepatocellular carcinoma model induced by genotoxin Diethylnitrosamine.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Liver-specific knockout of murine Bruce impaired actin cytoskeleton reorganization activation and exacerbated inflammation, fibrosis and hepatocellular carcinoma, which exhibited a trabecular architecture, closely resembling human phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation.

In humans, the clinical relevance of regulation of cytokinesis downregulation in liver disease was found in hepatitis, cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma specimens and deleterious somatic mutations of the regulation of cytokinesis gene was found in human hepatocellular carcinoma in TCGA database.

Conclusion: These findings establish a new regulation of cytokinesis-actin cytoskeleton reorganization signaling axis in accurate DNA replication and suppression of liver cancer in mice and humans and provides a clinically relevant phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation mouse model.
